nodes.text: Salt was a natural substance used as an ingredient in cooking. It could be used as a flavoring for noodles. Young nerfs craved salt, and on the planet Arkanis calves from a herd owned by the Imperial Arkanis Academy sometimes strayed down onto the Academy's beach looking for salt. The Arcona Hem Dazon spent all of his credits on salt and juri juice while he was on the planet Tatooine.

Crait was a planet that for a time hosted an outpost of the Rebel Alliance and was covered in a sheet of white salt. It was dominated by white salt flats, but disturbing them exposed the red amirite underneath.
In the parched wastelands of Jakku, salt burned the scavenger Rey's eyes and parched her throat, but salt of the sea of Ahch-To refreshed her.
The expansive oceans of Ahch-To gave rise to wildlife on the planet with salt glands as a common evolutionary trait, allowing them to extract sea salt from their food and drink.
